A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What a horrible direction to take starwars in\, throwing out all the great novels and fanfiction is one thing\, but theres no sense of Grace/nobility/moral purpose\,  it's missing the whole air of starwars.  The conflict between the light/dark seems shallow\, not deep rooted and sinister like the original 6.  I call for a redo.
